content: They'll warn you against trying to make your own way, but you can't exactly do nothing. Still, it pays to heed their warning -- this place is not going to be easy to traverse, especially with minds "ebbing away with the tides of chants".
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Pagoda Realm Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
They'll warn you against trying to make your own way, but you can't exactly do nothing. Still, it pays to heed their warning -- this place is not going to be easy to traverse, especially with minds "ebbing away with the tides of chants".
